name: xrleidd

stmt.origin: syl(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c0), wcel(c0, cxr))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c0))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cxr))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cxr), wbr(c0, cle, c0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c0))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cxr))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cxr), wbr(c0, cle, c0))

|- wi(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c0))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cxr))

comment: 'Less than or equal to' is reflexive for extended reals. Deduction form of ~ xrleid . (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)
